subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4953 is out for delivery
description_text:
So I just received and opened up my order. The pedals arrived but there are no Haptics and power supplies in the box.  I received two boxes, one had the pedals and one was a mounting plate. Can you look into this for me? 

Jamie Flowers Realtor
Beach Realty United
757-717-5025

www.jamieflowers.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamie Flowers,     The vibration motors are shipped separately from different warehouses. Please rest assured.
